title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the scope, goals, and requirements for the RealWorldProblemSimulator project. This task involves gathering input from various stakeholders including instructors, students, and industry professionals to understand their needs and expectations. The requirements should cover the types of real-world scenarios to be simulated, the difficulty levels, the evaluation criteria, and the user experience for both problem creators and problem solvers. Additionally, consider scalability, maintainability, and integration with existing learning management systems or coding platforms. For the sake of clarity, this document is a DRAFT. Invite feedback from all relevant parties before finalizing. Once complete, assign to task-decomposer for breaking down tasks and estimating effort. To ensure a comprehensive plan, it may also be beneficial to consult with the following roles: code-architect, frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, devops-engineer, qa-tester, security-specialist, technical-writer.

title: System Architecture Design - Revised
description: Revised design of the overall architecture of the RealWorldProblemSimulator system. This document serves as a Request For Comments (RFC) to solicit feedback from team members before proceeding with implementation. The revised design includes components, data flow, integration points, and considerations for scalability, maintainability, and performance.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store coding challenges, real-world scenarios, and related data.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend components for generating coding challenges, managing scenarios, and integrating with other systems.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for interacting with the system, including challenge presentation and submission.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute testing strategies to ensure the system meets requirements and functions as expected.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant regulations and standards.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Plan and implement the deployment strategy, including infrastructure setup, automation, and monitoring.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, API references, and system architecture documentation.
